messages.message:
Full Time Opportunity - Software Engineer - Phoenix, Az
tweir@pdsinc.com

Thank you for the connect Tyler.  I am so busy with interviews right now, I need to start skipping steps.  If you don't understand something about my experience, it would be extremely helpful if you could help me improve my resume to make it more understandable.  Check this out:
the resume you sent me is for marissa?
Yes, I am wondering if I should reformat my resume to look like hers.  You can already see my resume from my LinkedIn profile right?
no it's not allowing me to view your resume. go ahead and send me your resume and I'll take a look at it
That is a problem.  Did you accept my connect?

Do you see the experience section on 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/megamindbrian
What kind of feedback have you been getting from the places you've interviewed?
Excellent feedback!  I have 3 technical interviews set up for next week.  What does your timeline look like?
